text: Keep on doing this crazy, great stuff. I hope to see you talking on future conferences. You're one of my favourite speakers at #oredev.
Madness :) - Thanks, it means a lot to get +ve feedback from people, talking at a large event like this was very intimidating indeed.
It was nice to meet u there. I'd definitely try RavenDB in the nearest future - it was pleasure to attend your tuesday tutorial on RavenDB. See u next year - I hope!

I really enjoyed the workshop and learnt a lot. It was great getting this insight into RavenDB and be able to try it out with some guidance. Hope to see you at some future conference. QCon in London, March 2011 maybe? Also a very very good conference.
